item.title: Ami add a quote by Rosemarie Urquico
item.description: "If you find a girl who reads, keep her close. When you find her up at 2 AM clutching a book to her chest and weeping, make her a cup of tea and hold her. You may lose her for a couple of hours but she will always come back to you. She’ll talk as if the characters in the book are real, because for a while, they always are.Date a girl who reads because you deserve it. You deserve a girl who can give you the most colorful life imaginable. If you can only give her monotony, and stale hours and half-baked proposals, then you’re better off alone. If you want the world and the worlds beyond it, date a girl who reads." -- Rosemarie Urquico

item.title: Ami add a quote by Mario Andretti
item.description: "If everything seems under control, you're not going fast enough." -- Mario Andretti

item.title: Ami add a quote by Maurice Sendak
item.description: "I'll eat you up I love you so." -- Maurice Sendak

item.title: Ami add a quote by Agatha Christie
item.description: "Alas," murmured Poirot to his mustaches, "that one can only eat three times a day ..." -- Agatha Christie

item.title: Ami add a quote by Leslie Jamison
item.description: "Empathy requires knowing that you know nothing." -- Leslie Jamison
